creditline: Gift of Fay Gallus and Richard Sweet

inscription: LLC on mount in pencil: V1-10
signed: LRC on mount in pencil: Ansel Adams
text: Having worked closely with the Department of Photography and New Media’s longtime supporter and champion, Martin Weinstein, Fay Gallus and Richard Sweet have created a gift that speaks to our collection’s longstanding interest in social and cultural events and concerns. They provide evidence of the vast capacity of the medium to document, explore, and capture human experiences across the globe, and therefore comprise manifold possibilities for future audiences’ engagement with photographic works of art.
title: Gottardo Piazzoni in his Studio
